_documentation.overview: Combat skills database for party members in DreamWorld

skill_system.description: Each character has up to 6 skill slots - 4 combat skills shown in Skills_Menu, and 2 action skills used from the main menu

skill_types.description: Skills usable in battle, cost JUICE to use
Skills used from main menu (like BOOK, THROW, SMASH)

combat_philosophy.early_game: At the start of the game, there are no violent combat options. Instead, players have DEFENSE and ABILITIES to either confront or help enemies.
combat_philosophy.quote: Using your SKILLS, even the most violent enemies can be defeated through various acts of kindness!
combat_philosophy.progression: Violent combat skills are unlocked later in the story for certain characters

HEART.description: HEART is the HP value, representing the health points party members and enemies have.
HEART.notes: If a party member's HEART is depleted completely, they become TOAST and are unable to battle nor earn any EXP unless revived.

JUICE.description: JUICE is the MP value, representing the magic points party members and enemies possess.
JUICE.notes: Only party members are required to have a certain amount of JUICE to use their COMBAT SKILLS. Enemies do not require JUICE for their SKILLS, instead using this trait to reduce damage taken when inflicted with SADNESS.

ATTACK.description: Determines the damage dealt to a foe.
ATTACK.notes: A higher ATTACK stat increases chances of landing critical blows, with some exceptions depending on character stats.

DEFENSE.description: Determines how much damage received is reduced against an enemy's attacks and skills.
DEFENSE.notes: Higher DEFENSE reduces damage taken, with exceptions for certain SKILLS that negate DEFENSE.

SPEED.description: SPEED is the AGILITY value, determining the order of which friends and foes perform their actions.
SPEED.notes: Also impacts chances of running away from battle and various SKILL formulas.

LUCK.description: LUCK affects the user's CRITICAL HIT rate.
LUCK.notes: Each LUCK point adds 1% to CRITICAL HIT rate. Does not increase when leveling up.

HIT_RATE.description: Determines the possibility of successfully landing a blow on an enemy.
HIT_RATE.notes: The HIT stat in-game is HIT RATE divided by 1%. When HIT RATE >= 100%, attacks always hit.

emotion_system._note: EMOTIONS can be inflicted on friends/foes by certain ATTACKS, SKILLS, FOLLOW-UPS, ITEMS, or scripted events
emotion_system.philosophy: The player should focus on deciding which emotion a character should have to gain the advantage over any foe they encounter.

triangle.description: As noted by MAKOMI herself: HAPPY beats ANGRY, ANGRY beats SAD, and SAD beats HAPPY!

neutral.name: NEUTRAL
neutral.description: The default emotional state. No stat modifications.

happy.name: HAPPY
happy.description: A HAPPY friend/foe has increased LUCK and SPEED, but a lowered HIT RATE. When a friend/foe is even more HAPPY, they become stronger.

higher_stages.effects: LUCK and SPEED increased further, HIT RATE lowered further

personality_bonus.effect: LUCK and SPEED increased even further, HIT RATE also lowers accordingly

happy.battle_rewards: HAPPY foes have higher chance to drop items and reward 50% more COINS

sad.name: SAD
sad.description: A SAD friend/foe has increased DEFENSE but decreased SPEED. Part of the damage that would be dealt to HEART is dealt to JUICE instead.
special_effects: part of HEART damage dealt to JUICE instead

higher_stages.effects: Even higher DEFENSE, even lower SPEED. More HEART damage redirected to JUICE.

personality_vulnerability.effect: Characters with melancholic personality suffer from this more easily

sad.battle_rewards: SAD foes reward 25% less EXPERIENCE and COINS

angry.name: ANGRY
angry.description: An ANGRY friend/foe has increased ATTACK but decreased DEFENSE. When even more ANGRY, they become stronger.

higher_stages.effects: Much higher ATTACK, but DEFENSE drops even lower

afraid.name: AFRAID
afraid.description: An AFRAID friend cannot perform ATTACKS or use skills other than GUARD and CALM DOWN. Increases damage received by 1.5x from non-NEUTRAL emotions.
afraid.notes: Cannot be inflicted by normal means such as ITEMS or SKILLS. Usually reserved for story-related battles.
afraid.higher_stages: Normally does not have higher stages, except for RAINY who can become STRESSED OUT

stressed_out.name: STRESSED OUT
stressed_out.description: A unique emotion exclusive to RAINY. RAINY reaches a breaking point and becomes STRESSED OUT.
stressed_out.notes: None of RAINY's skills can be used or even accessed once he becomes STRESSED OUT. Occurs when AFRAID reaches breaking point in story-related battles.

stressed.name: STRESSED
stressed.description: A terrifying state exclusive to STRANGER. When stressed, she becomes a force of terror.
stressed.notes: Stranger becomes terrifying when stressed. Her attacks can inflict AFRAID on enemies, but her presence may also frighten allies.

exceptions: CHARM or WEAPON equipped that makes them start with an EMOTION
Encounter invokes the AFRAID emotion (story battles)

damage_mechanics.description: Damage can be increased or decreased depending on the user's and target's EMOTIONS.
damage_mechanics.stage_effects: Higher tier EMOTION affects damage taken, but not damage dealt (except ANGRY's ATTACK boost).
damage_mechanics.example: A HAPPY HIKIKO takes up to 2.5x more damage from a SAD foe. However, that same HAPPY HIKIKO only deals 150% more damage to an ANGRY foe.

defense.name: Defense
defense.description: Protective skills that reduce damage or provide safety

support.name: Support
support.description: Skills that help allies through healing, buffs, or emotional support

pacify.name: Pacify
pacify.description: Skills that calm, soothe, or befriend enemies

emotional.name: Emotional
emotional.description: Skills that manipulate emotions - both positive and negative

music.name: Music
music.description: Musical skills that affect mood and battlefield conditions

violent.name: Violent
violent.description: Aggressive combat skills that deal damage (unlocked later)

emotional_profile.description: A melancholic and neutral personality. Prone to negative emotions and vulnerable to fear.
emotional_profile.notes: Rainy struggles with negative emotions and is the only character who can become STRESSED OUT. However, Hikiko can calm him even when AFRAID.

hikiko.description: A caring friend who supports the party with protective and encouraging skills. Keeps his pacifist ways throughout.

emotional_profile.description: A bright, smiling boy with a naturally happy disposition. Key emotional support for the party.

cheer_sad_allies.description: Has a chance to cheer up SAD allies at the start of their turn

calm_angry_allies.description: Has a chance to calm down ANGRY allies at the start of their turn

emotional_profile.notes: Hikiko is the emotional anchor of the party. He naturally tends toward happiness, can cheer up sad teammates, calm angry ones, and uniquely can help Rainy when he's AFRAID. A key support character.

stranger.description: A mysterious odd being. Unlike the others, Stranger has access to violent skills from the start.

emotional_profile.description: Not human. Does not feel emotions like others. Has only three states and becomes terrifying when stressed.

stressed_state.name: STRESSED
stressed_state.description: When Stranger becomes stressed (rare), she becomes terrifying. Her attacks frighten enemies and her presence can scare allies.

emotional_profile.notes: Stranger is an inhuman entity that doesn't experience emotions normally. She can only be neutral, angry, or stressed. Her stressed state is terrifying - she can frighten both enemies AND potentially allies. A powerful but unpredictable ally.

guard.name: GUARD
guard.description: Acts first, reducing damage taken by 50% for 1 turn.

calm_down.name: CALM DOWN
calm_down.description: Take a deep breath and center yourself. Removes STRESSED, ANGRY, or AFRAID and restores some JUICE.
calm_down.notes: One of only two skills usable when AFRAID

focus.name: FOCUS
focus.description: Concentrate deeply on the present moment. Increases accuracy and critical chance for the next attack.

persist.name: PERSIST
persist.description: Refuse to give up, no matter what. If HP would drop to 0, survive with 1 HP instead (once per battle).

overcome.name: OVERCOME
overcome.description: Draw strength from past struggles. Converts negative emotions into a temporary attack boost.

cherish.name: CHERISH
cherish.description: Hold onto what matters most. Heals an ally and increases their defense based on your bond.

sweet_smile.name: SWEET SMILE
sweet_smile.description: Offer a genuine, warm smile. May make an enemy HAPPY, lowering their hit rate.

sad_poem.name: SAD POEM
sad_poem.description: Recite a melancholic poem from memory. Makes an enemy SAD, increasing their defense but lowering speed.
sad_poem.emotion_strategy: Use against HAPPY enemies for advantage, but beware of ANGRY foes!

encore.name: ENCORE
encore.description: Applaud and encourage an ally's performance. Allows an ally to act again immediately.

allegro.name: ALLEGRO
allegro.description: Play an upbeat, energizing melody. Makes all allies HAPPY, increasing luck and speed.

hug.name: HUG
hug.description: Embrace someone with all your warmth. Heals an ally and removes AFRAID or SAD emotions.

desperate_strike.name: DESPERATE STRIKE
desperate_strike.description: When all else fails... sometimes you have to fight. A reluctant but powerful attack. Makes Rainy SAD afterwards.

pep_talk.name: PEP TALK
pep_talk.description: Makes a friend or foe HAPPY.

protect.name: PROTECT
protect.description: Shield a friend from harm! Take damage in place of an ally this turn.

cheer.name: CHEER
cheer.description: Heals all friends' JUICE by 20%. Greatly increases a STAT by three tiers if HIKIKO is feeling an EMOTION.

book.name: BOOK
book.description: Open the memory book to view past memories and photos.

focus_action.name: FOCUS
focus_action.description: Concentrate to increase movement speed temporarily.

headbutt.name: HEADBUTT
headbutt.description: A quick head attack to interact with objects.

throw_action.name: THROW
throw_action.description: Throw objects at targets in the world.

smash_action.name: SMASH
smash_action.description: Smash objects with the giant hammer.

attack_stranger.name: ATTACK
attack_stranger.description: BASIC ATTACK. A standard physical strike.

vertigo.name: VERTIGO
vertigo.description: Deals damage to all foes based on user's SPEED and greatly reduces their ATTACK.

suffocate.name: SUFFOCATE
suffocate.description: Deals 400 damage to all foes and greatly reduces their DEFENSE.

terrorize.name: TERRORIZE
terrorize.description: Reduces all of a foe's STATS.

strike.name: STRIKE
strike.description: Strikes all foes. Deals more damage if STRANGER has a higher stage of STRESSED OUT.
strike.notes: Damage scales with STRANGER's STRESSED OUT stage

first_aid.name: FIRST AID
first_aid.description: Heals a friend for 25% of their HEART.

curveball.name: CURVEBALL
curveball.description: Makes a foe feel a random EMOTION. Deals extra damage to foes with EMOTION.

megaphone.name: MEGAPHONE
megaphone.description: Makes all friends in party ANGRY.
megaphone.emotion_strategy: Use when facing SAD enemies for the advantage!

rally.name: RALLY
rally.description: HIKIKO becomes HAPPY. HIKIKO's friends recover some ENERGY and JUICE. Restores 4 ENERGY and 30% JUICE to his allies.

annoy.name: ANNOY
annoy.description: Makes a friend or foe ANGRY.

sweet_smile_hikiko.name: SWEET SMILE
sweet_smile_hikiko.description: Acts first, reducing a foe's ATTACK.

body_slam.name: BODY SLAM
body_slam.description: Deals damage that increases with more ENERGY. Damage output depends on HIKIKO's level (which equals RAINY's level).

notes.damage_scaling: Higher emotion stages affect damage TAKEN but not damage DEALT
notes.max_vulnerability: Up to 2.5x damage at highest emotion stage
